directors: Director : Joaquim Dos Santos, Kemp Powers, Justin K. Thompson
cast: Cast : Shameik Moore, Hailee Steinfeld, Brian Tyree Henry, Luna Lauren Velez
movie_description: Summary : Miles Morales catapults across the Multiverse, where he encounters a team of Spider-People charged with protecting its very existence. When the heroes clash on how to handle a new threat, Miles must redefine what it means to be a hero.

cast: Cast : Daveigh Chase, Suzanne Pleshette, Miyu Irino, Rumi Hiiragi
movie_description: Summary : During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches and spirits, a world where humans are changed into beasts.

cast: Cast : Matthew Broderick, Jeremy Irons, James Earl Jones, Whoopi Goldberg
movie_description: Summary : Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

cast: Cast : Tsutomu Tatsumi, Ayano Shiraishi, Akemi Yamaguchi, Yoshiko Shinohara
movie_description: Summary : A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

directors: Director : Bob Persichetti, Peter Ramsey, Rodney Rothman
cast: Cast : Shameik Moore, Jake Johnson, Hailee Steinfeld, Mahershala Ali
movie_description: Summary : Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

cast: Cast : Anthony Gonzalez, Gael García Bernal, Benjamin Bratt, Alanna Ubach
movie_description: Summary : Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

cast: Cast : Ryunosuke Kamiki, Mone Kamishiraishi, Ryo Narita, Aoi Yûki
movie_description: Summary : Two teenagers share a profound, magical connection upon discovering they are swapping bodies. Things manage to become even more complicated when the boy and girl decide to meet in person.

cast: Cast : Ben Burtt, Elissa Knight, Jeff Garlin, Fred Willard
movie_description: Summary : In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

cast: Cast : Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Don Rickles, Jim Varney
movie_description: Summary : A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman action figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's bedroom.

cast: Cast : Edward Asner, Jordan Nagai, John Ratzenberger, Christopher Plummer
movie_description: Summary : 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

cast: Cast : Yôji Matsuda, Yuriko Ishida, Yûko Tanaka, Billy Crudup
movie_description: Summary : On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

cast: Cast : Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack, Ned Beatty
movie_description: Summary : The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

cast: Cast : Chieko Baishô, Takuya Kimura, Tatsuya Gashûin, Akihiro Miwa
movie_description: Summary : When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.

cast: Cast : Albert Brooks, Ellen DeGeneres, Alexander Gould, Willem Dafoe
movie_description: Summary : After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

directors: Director : Sergio Pablos, Carlos Martínez López
cast: Cast : Jason Schwartzman, J.K. Simmons, Rashida Jones, Will Sasso
movie_description: Summary : A simple act of kindness always sparks another, even in a frozen, faraway place. When Smeerensburg's new postman, Jesper, befriends toymaker Klaus, their gifts melt an age-old feud and deliver a sleigh full of holiday traditions.

movie_name: Title : Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Movie: Mugen Train
cast: Cast : Natsuki Hanae, Akari Kitô, Yoshitsugu Matsuoka, Hiro Shimono
movie_description: Summary : After his family was brutally murdered and his sister turned into a demon, Tanjiro Kamado's journey as a demon slayer began. Tanjiro and his comrades embark on a new mission aboard the Mugen Train, on track to despair.

cast: Cast : Brad Garrett, Lou Romano, Patton Oswalt, Ian Holm
movie_description: Summary : A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous Paris restaurant.

directors: Director : Pete Docter, Ronnie Del Carmen
cast: Cast : Amy Poehler, Bill Hader, Lewis Black, Mindy Kaling
movie_description: Summary : After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust, and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.

directors: Director : Pete Docter, David Silverman, Lee Unkrich
cast: Cast : Billy Crystal, John Goodman, Mary Gibbs, Steve Buscemi
movie_description: Summary : In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, two monsters realize things may not be what they think.

movie_name: Title : How to Train Your Dragon
cast: Cast : Jay Baruchel, Gerard Butler, Christopher Mintz-Plasse, Craig Ferguson
movie_description: Summary : A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

cast: Cast : Hitoshi Takagi, Noriko Hidaka, Chika Sakamoto, Shigesato Itoi
movie_description: Summary : When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.

cast: Cast : Eli Marienthal, Harry Connick Jr., Jennifer Aniston, Vin Diesel
movie_description: Summary : A young boy befriends a giant robot from outer space that a paranoid government agent wants to destroy.

movie_name: Title : A Silent Voice: The Movie
cast: Cast : Miyu Irino, Saori Hayami, Aoi Yûki, Kenshô Ono
movie_description: Summary : A young man is ostracized by his classmates after he bullies a deaf girl to the point where she moves away. Years later, he sets off on a path for redemption.

movie_name: Title : Neon Genesis Evangelion: The End of Evangelion
cast: Cast : Megumi Ogata, Megumi Hayashibara, Yûko Miyamura, Kotono Mitsuishi
movie_description: Summary : Concurrent theatrical ending of the TV series Neon Genesis Evangelion (1995).

cast: Cast : Toni Collette, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Eric Bana, Barry Humphries
movie_description: Summary : A tale of friendship between two unlikely pen pals: Mary, a lonely, eight-year-old girl living in the suburbs of Melbourne, and Max, a forty-four-year old, severely obese man living in New York.

cast: Cast : Aoi Miyazaki, Takao Osawa, Haru Kuroki, Yukito Nishii
movie_description: Summary : After her werewolf lover unexpectedly dies in an accident while hunting for food for their children, a young woman must find ways to raise the werewolf son and daughter that she had with him while keeping their trait hidden from society.

cast: Cast : Craig T. Nelson, Samuel L. Jackson, Holly Hunter, Jason Lee
movie_description: Summary : While trying to lead a quiet suburban life, a family of undercover superheroes are forced into action to save the world.

directors: Director : Byron Howard, Rich Moore, Jared Bush
cast: Cast : Ginnifer Goodwin, Jason Bateman, Idris Elba, Jenny Slate
movie_description: Summary : In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy.

cast: Cast : Scott Weinger, Robin Williams, Linda Larkin, Jonathan Freeman
movie_description: Summary : A kind-hearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true.

cast: Cast : Paige O'Hara, Robby Benson, Jesse Corti, Rex Everhart
movie_description: Summary : A prince cursed to spend his days as a hideous monster sets out to regain his humanity by earning a young woman's love.

cast: Cast : Jamie Foxx, Tina Fey, Graham Norton, Rachel House
movie_description: Summary : After landing the gig of a lifetime, a New York jazz pianist suddenly finds himself trapped in a strange land between Earth and the afterlife.

cast: Cast : Junko Iwao, Rica Matsumoto, Shinpachi Tsuji, Masaaki Ôkura
movie_description: Summary : A pop singer gives up her career to become an actress, but she slowly goes insane when she starts being stalked by an obsessed fan and what seems to be a ghost of her past.

cast: Cast : Mitsuo Iwata, Nozomu Sasaki, Mami Koyama, Tesshô Genda
movie_description: Summary : A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath who can only be stopped by a teenager, his gang of biker friends and a group of psychics.

cast: Cast : Mayumi Tanaka, Keiko Yokozawa, Kotoe Hatsui, Minori Terada
movie_description: Summary : A young boy and a girl with a magic crystal must race against pirates and foreign agents in a search for a legendary floating castle.

movie_name: Title : Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind
cast: Cast : Sumi Shimamoto, Mahito Tsujimura, Hisako Kyôda, Gorô Naya
movie_description: Summary : Warrior and pacifist Princess Nausicaä desperately struggles to prevent two warring nations from destroying themselves and their dying planet.

cast: Cast : Honor Kneafsey, Eva Whittaker, Sean Bean, Simon McBurney
movie_description: Summary : A young apprentice hunter and her father journey to Ireland to help wipe out the last wolf pack. But everything changes when she befriends a free-spirited girl from a mysterious tribe rumored to transform into wolves by night.

cast: Cast : Chiara Mastroianni, Catherine Deneuve, Gena Rowlands, Danielle Darrieux
movie_description: Summary : A precocious and outspoken Iranian girl grows up during the Islamic Revolution.

cast: Cast : David Rawle, Brendan Gleeson, Lisa Hannigan, Fionnula Flanagan
movie_description: Summary : Ben, a young Irish boy, and his little sister Saoirse, a girl who can turn into a seal, go on an adventure to free the fairies and save the spirit world.

movie_name: Title : The Tale of The Princess Kaguya
cast: Cast : Chloë Grace Moretz, James Caan, Mary Steenburgen, James Marsden
movie_description: Summary : Found inside a shining stalk of bamboo by an old bamboo cutter and his wife, a tiny girl grows rapidly into an exquisite young lady. The mysterious young princess enthralls all who encounter her, but ultimately she must confront her fate, the punishment for her crime.

cast: Cast : Danny Elfman, Chris Sarandon, Catherine O'Hara, William Hickey
movie_description: Summary : Jack Skellington, king of Halloween Town, discovers Christmas Town, but his attempts to bring Christmas to his home causes confusion.

cast: Cast : George Clooney, Meryl Streep, Bill Murray, Jason Schwartzman
movie_description: Summary : An urbane fox cannot resist returning to his farm raiding ways and then must help his community survive the farmers' retaliation.

cast: Cast : Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy, Cameron Diaz, John Lithgow
movie_description: Summary : A mean lord exiles fairytale creatures to the swamp of a grumpy ogre, who must go on a quest and rescue a princess for the lord in order to get his land back.

directors: Director : John Lasseter, Ash Brannon, Lee Unkrich
cast: Cast : Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack, Kelsey Grammer
movie_description: Summary : When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends set out on a rescue mission to save Woody before he becomes a museum toy property with his roundup gang Jessie, Prospector, and Bullseye.

cast: Cast : Atsuko Tanaka, Iemasa Kayumi, Akio Ôtsuka, Kôichi Yamadera
movie_description: Summary : A cyborg policewoman and her partner hunt a mysterious and powerful hacker called the Puppet Master.

movie_name: Title : Puss in Boots: The Last Wish
cast: Cast : Antonio Banderas, Salma Hayek, Harvey Guillén, Florence Pugh
movie_description: Summary : When Puss in Boots discovers that his passion for adventure has taken its toll and he has burned through eight of his nine lives, he launches an epic journey to restore them by finding the mythical Last Wish.

cast: Cast : Ryan Potter, Scott Adsit, Jamie Chung, T.J. Miller
movie_description: Summary : A special bond develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax and prodigy Hiro Hamada, who together team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.

cast: Cast : Kirsten Dunst, Minami Takayama, Rei Sakuma, Kappei Yamaguchi
movie_description: Summary : A young witch, on her mandatory year of independent life, finds fitting into a new community difficult while she supports herself by running an air courier service.

cast: Cast : Chinatsu Akasaki, Aya Endô, Kana Hanazawa, Show Hayami
movie_description: Summary : Yuta Okkotsu, a high schooler who gains control of an extremely powerful Cursed Spirit and gets enrolled in the Tokyo Prefectural Jujutsu High School by Jujutsu Sorcerers to help him control his power and keep an eye on him.

cast: Cast : Bryan Cranston, Koyu Rankin, Edward Norton, Bob Balaban
movie_description: Summary : Set in Japan, Isle of Dogs follows a boy's odyssey in search of his lost dog.

cast: Cast : Douglas Booth, Jerome Flynn, Robert Gulaczyk, Helen McCrory
movie_description: Summary : In a story depicted in oil painted animation, a young man comes to the last hometown of painter Vincent van Gogh to deliver the troubled artist's final letter and ends up investigating his final days there.
